documents.document: @patsharp Pat, I think your year today is 1971. #WhateverYouLike
@dreamersball39 @QueenieOfNorway @FoxVegas @safetycute You most certainly are. I'm in the UK, and they'll be a bit older before they're here
@TomLondon6 This is brilliant! Keep going, everyone. Let him know how unpopular he really is. #StandUpToTrump
@dreamersball39 @QueenieOfNorway @FoxVegas @safetycute So pleased for you.
@KymYSmith You're going to see them in the USA, Kym? I'm jealous!
@glamgran58 Oh Cameron, I'm so glad you did! A guy rang the ticket office at Houston, and found out that the presale starts 7th Feb.
@KiannaNicholson @calm Tell me about it. I love it!
@MikeReadUK There REALLY ought to be a series of #PopQuiz. Seemingly, @BBCFOUR doesn't want a hit - would anyone else take it?
@billybones53 Don't expect it to get 1.7 MILLION signatures, will you?
@cananito @Amy_Siskind You're surprised? I wouldn't want to be within fifty miles of the bigot!
@EricHolthaus @sianberry He's so full of hot air he's probably responsible for most of their greenhouse gases! Very serious subject.
@willtravers Saw you on the news taking about baby chimps. What was that badge you were wearing?
@Con_Dem_Nation @2ndwitch Got to agree with that! #StandUpToTrump
South Tyneside Council: don't fine homeless people for accepting food and drink! https://t.co/36uhj5bb2o PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU.
Trump's advisors: condemn his Muslim ban now. This is immoral. https://t.co/t2mEVSqsXi PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.
@patsharp I think I'm wrong, and your year is 1988. When I counted back, I realised.
@patsharp Hello Pat. I think your year is 1990. I'm going by George Bush being elected. That always happens in an even-numbered year.
@GoldenRaffa Absolutely! He'd make Freddie jealous over his "Killer Queen" routine. Freddie could NEVER have got away with it!
@BBCFOUR When are we going to get a full series of #PopQuiz with @MikeReadUK as the host? It's unmissable, and definitely a hit!! #PopQuiz
@EspineuxAlpha @sianwilliams100 Love that SIGN! Retweeted too.
@TomLondon6 .....they like her even less!
@TomLondon6 Don't hold your breath! You know the BBC broadcast what they're told to. The only presenter you can trust is Carol Kirkwood!
@richardosman Now THAT WILL be worth seeing!
@richardosman I didn't think he was, but he's certainly #Pointless enough!
@QueenFacts1991 No, you can tell it's the John Birch copy - videos were about all it was good for!
@MikeReadUK SHOULD be on Caroline Flashback or Radio Two.
@richardosman They don't come more Pointless than him, that's for sure!
@ChiaraTomaini Signed it, Chiara.
@Yahoo I boycott Starbucks because they support the badger cull. Managed to get a few others onside, too.
@ruskin147 Sounds contemporary!
@Amy_Siskind Look at this @therealdonald_
@FriendsofAlAqsa @CJ_LocoZorro Yeah, right. That's the same British Government who's going to ignore a million who want to #banTrumpFromUK.
@TomLondon6 Someone has to be. He doesn't half attract them, doesn't he? Nigel Farage, Piers Morgan and now this guy. #banTrumpFromUK
Petition: Suspend Natural England licence to kill buzzards. https://t.co/wh7AGlL7s0 PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.
@QueenObsessed It'll have to now. I think it's already started with that petition to stop Enda Kennedy going to America to give DT shamrocks
@jon_bartley @LonGreenParty Can we ban HIM from entering Britain, do you think?
@DrBrianMay Yes, I thought so too. Maybe if Trump grabbed his sister by the pussy, Boris might be a bit more vocal.
@QueenFacts1991 Then carried on in the Lyndan Darby novels, Crystal & Steel, Bloodseed and Phoenix Fire - in that order.
@TomLondon6 Very depressing. Tonight used to be a good programme.
Petition: End the badger cull instead of expanding to new areas https://t.co/1cmWPmzjpH PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.
@PilgrimTucker @EJANDODIN If I could sign it again, believe me I would. Signed yesterday, there were only 267,000 odd then.
@callycapz It will, won't it? Rufus is obviously allowed to join up with QAL as often as he can.
@TheGreenParty Already signed, Tweeted, Facebooked. Retweeted yours too, as a matter of fact. We don't want him here.
@Amy_Siskind Democrats and Republicans TALK TO EACH OTHER? Get real. It ain't gonna happen!
@BBCBreakfast Terry Wogan got it right - he didn't take it seriously! We should pull our money out, and see how many people like us THEN.
@Amy_Siskind You know he will. Probably that judge that wants gay people arrested for having consensual sex behind closed doors. #Hitler
Please sign & RT this petition, it means a lot to me: https://t.co/G8eDKmrHoH via @38_degrees PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU SO MUCH.
@patsharp I'll go for 1992, even though I'm not great on these records. I probably could Google, but where's the fun? #WhateverYouLike
@MikeReadUK The wonderful show that is #PopQuiz HAS to get a series. All we need now is for @BBCFOUR to do as they're told!
@TomLondon6 Because they'll SAY different, but secretly they agree with him. #ScaryIsntIt?
@Glambert2821 @PalmerReport @DailyNewsBin How many still need to be coloured in?
@Amy_Siskind Let's not! Hitler wanted his Master Race - where's Trump going to stop? Muslims? Gays?
@BohemianKatsody Start meditation. I use the Calm app. I can recommend it.
@TomLondon6 Don't think the government DO oppose him - it just SOUNDS good. #TheresaTheAppeaser
@QueenObsessed Ridiculous isn't it? That some people have to be educated.
@calm I love Calm meditations. Haven't tried the walking one though - yet!
@Rags_and_Bamboo He's so unstable, I wouldn't like to trust him to tell the difference! #TheresaTheAppeaser
@MikeSRigby Probably more by now, though. It only started today too - and petitions only need to be 100,000 to get discussed in Parliament.
@HBovill Keep taking those amazing photos of QAL. I still say LSC should publish them.
#TheresaTheAppeaser https://t.co/F0m5OTMYJC

@rittster Yes, you can. Just become a Republican!
@TomLondon6 Who will, of course, airbrush it out. Don't think it's going to be remarked on, do you?
@BillPalmer @KymYSmith Great. He doesn't know what pressure is yet. We've only just got started!
@domdyer70 You're behind the times. I looked recently, it's over 668,000 and rising. Get the feeling he isn't wanted here, don't you?
@theresa_may You do realise what people are saying, don't you? #TheresaTheAppeaser is trending on twitter. He's Hitler, you're Chamberlain.
Petition: Prevent Donald Trump from making a State Visit to the United Kingdom. https://t.co/2bq7uofmUc PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU.
@billybones53 No, but it's horrible. Money seems to supersede everything else. I thought that went when Cameron did. #HowWrongCanYouBe?
@GreenRobTelford @billybones53 We're talking here about a woman who didn't even have to win an election. She was foisted on us.
@thedarkness @callycapz Who'll be drumming? Rufus will be on tour with Queen + Adam Lambert.
.@Amazon: Breitbart's brand of bigotry is bad for business. Stop advertising with it now. PLEASE, #dontfundhate https://t.co/idre6zzNjU
https://t.co/3WyT8gPeLd PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH.
@MikeReadUK Apparently, Brian Matthew has been got rid of on Sounds Of The Sixties on Radio 2. Would you, could you take over? Just an idea
@cjdemooi I'm one of the late(r) risers. Good morning CJ. 👍
Carrefour, Lidl, Aldi: Stop selling eggs from caged hens across Europe https://t.co/fnS1LXkZoU PLEASE SIGN AND RETWEET. THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
Franco could be deported because Sweden says he couldn’t "prove" he's gay. Here's how you can help: https://t.co/OW5Tu1cAz9 PLS SIGN, R/T.
The construction permit for a key section of #DAPL rejected - but the fight isn't over. Get banks to pull out: https://t.co/SHnl4o6odk
@patsharp Your year today is 1976 - when Southampton last played Manchester United. There was one goal - Southampton in the 86th minute.
@BBCFOUR Are we to assume that you don't want a hit show if you don't bring #PopQuiz back with @MikeReadUK as quizmaster?
@roisintrunk Right then, so USE IT!
@roisintrunk That's why his username is DrBrianMay - he got his Ph.D in astrophysics in 2007. He's been Dr ever since.
@roisintrunk DR Rock Star to you (and me, and anyone else - he hates being called Mr these days!).
